img_above_text:
### Windseal Gate Luojia Fragrant Vine
Windseal Gate Luojia Fragrant Vine
img_below_text:
The Windseal Gate Luojia Fragrant Vine can be found after defeating both the Stone Vanguard and Tiger Vanguard bosses. After defeating them, return to the area where you fought the King of Flowing Sands and Second Rat Price and place the Keenness of Tiger and Keenness of Stone items into the receptacle by the large stone door. Open the door, head down the hill and over the bridge to reach an open cave area with a statue carved into the rock face. The Vine is guarded by the Gore-Eye Daoist Spirit.
## The New West Luojia Fragrant Vines

img_summary: The image depicts a player character standing before a large, intricately carved statue embedded in a rock face, with a glowing tree adorned with orange flowers or fruits in the foreground. This scene is part of the "Windseal Gate Luojia Fragrant Vine" area in the game, where players must progress after defeating specific bosses and unlocking a stone door. The glowing tree and statue appear to be key environmental features, possibly marking the location of the Windseal Gate Luojia Fragrant Vine, which is guarded by the Gore-Eye Daoist Spirit.
